msContents.summary: The composite manuscript was personally curated by Adalbertus Rankonis Ericinio (= Albertus de Bohemia) and contains his own sermons and quaestions, his own catalog of the manuscripts of the College of the Sorbonne (f. 43r-42v), the Synonyma of Isidore Hisp., excerpts from the Anticlaudianus of Alanus de Insulis and others.

msItem.author: Philippus Cancellarius
msItem.title: Carmina Philippi Parisi(iensis) Cancellarii sacre theologie doctoris viri solempnissimi
msItem.note: Several poems by Philip without music.
